text: Pholidobolus hillisi is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Pholidobolus Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 2014 Category:Taxa named by Omar Torres-Carvajal Category:Taxa named by Pablo J. Venegas Category:Taxa named by Simón E. Lobos Category:Taxa named by Paola Mafla-Endara Category:Taxa named by Pedro M. Sales-Nunes
title: Pholidobolus hillisi
